name: Terrorist Force: Street Shooting
description:
Welcome to the world of shooting. Take the precise aim, make an accurate shot and enjoy the killing. Fight against the criminals and bad guys, kill them and become the ultimate pro shooter. Equip yourself with the deadly sniper rifle and start shooting. Are you ready to take the difficult challenge? Use your best sniper skills and make some great headshots

Features:
• Free to play for tablet and mobile
• Ultra HD 3d Graphics
• Realistic sounds
• Easy and smooth controls
• Beautiful 3d snow and desert environment
• Interesting and challenging missions
